name: Nutty Noon
summary: Nutty Noon is a Celeste mod which draws heavy inspiration from Kirby's Return to Dream Land, specifically level 5: Nutty Noon. It takes on the themes from this area, as well as the difficulty of the Kirby game (beginner). It focuses more on exploration and multiple routes, but also features a full B and C-side which are more linear and low intermediate difficulty.
